text: Jayma Suzette Mays (born Jamia Suzette Mays, July 16, 1979) is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actress. She is known for her roles as Emma Pillsbury in Glee, as Charlie in Ugly Betty, as Amy Anderson in Paul Blart: Mall Cop, and as Grace Winslow in The Smurfs and in Smurfs 2. Mays was born on July 16, 1979 in Bristol, Tennessee. She studied at Grundy High School, at Southwest Virginia Community College, and at Radford University. She was married to Adam Campbell since 2007. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Tennessee
title: Jayma Mays
